nodes.text: Gibs Nibbet was a Sullustan who served the Resistance as first officer aboard the bunkerbuster Ninka. After being assigned to the Ninka, Resistance technician Rose Tico was told by Nibbet that the ship could crack open a small moon. Nibbet also swore to Tico that if the Ninka had been at Starkiller Base, the Resistance wouldn't have needed starfighters.
